title: Ep 470 | Phil Robertson's Answer to the Unraveling of America
description:
Phil has watched America's unraveling for the past two years, and he thinks that the pendulum is beginning to swing in the opposite direction. Jase relives one of the greatest river harvests of Phil's life and provides the details on exactly where he took it. Al and Jase discuss the breakfast that Jesus shared on the seashore with his disciples just days after he had been crucified. And Al shares a message from a Marine who has greatly benefited from the Unashamed podcast.

Watch the Unashamed overtime show, only on BlazeTV: https://BlazeTV.com/Unashamed

Visit https://OmegaXL.com/PHIL and buy one bottle and get a second bottle free
